PUMA·U1 | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered. When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from colored spells, annihilator 6 When Emrakul, the Aeons Torn is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

trans-unit.source: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand. −3: Exile target permanent. −14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand. −3: Exile target permanent. −14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

trans-unit.source: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

trans-unit.source: Take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: Take an extra turn after this one.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{B}

trans-unit.source: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
